info.creator: Satoshi Nakamoto
info.name: Bitcoin
info.desc: The first and most widely used decentralized ledger currency,

info.creator: Charlie Lee
info.name: Litecoin
info.desc: One of the first cryptocurrencies to use scrypt as a hashing algorithm.

info.creator: Vincent Durham
info.name: Namecoin
info.desc: Also acts as an alternative, decentralized DNS.

info.creator: Sunny King(pseudonym)
info.name: Peercoin
info.desc: The first cryptocurrency to use both PoW and PoS functions.

info.creator: Jackson Palmer& Billy Markus
info.name: Dogecoin
info.desc: Based on the Doge internet meme.

info.creator: Rob H√§lford
info.name: Gridcoin
info.desc: Linked to citizen science through the Berkeley Open Infrastructure for Network Computing

info.creator: Sunny King(pseudonym)
info.name: Primecoin
info.desc: Uses the finding of prime chains composed of Cunningham chains and bi-twin chains for proof-of-work.

info.creator: Chris Larsen &Jed McCaleb
info.name: Ripple
info.desc: Designed for peer-to-peer debt transfer. Not based on bitcoin.

info.creator: BCNext(pseudonym)
info.name: Nxt
info.desc: Specifically designed as a flexible platform to build applications and financial services around its protocol.

info.creator: Baldur Odinsson(pseudonym)
info.name: Auroracoin
info.desc: Created as an alternative currency for Iceland, intended to replace the Icelandic kr√≥na.

info.creator: Evan Duffield &Kyle Hagan
info.name: Dash
info.desc: A bitcoin-based currency featuring instant transactions, decentralized governance and budgeting, and private transactions.

info.creator: Da Hongfei & Erik Zhang
info.name: NEO
info.desc: China based cryptocurrency, formerly ANT Shares and ANT Coins. The names were changed in 2017 to NEO and GAS.

info.creator: BTC Oyate Initiative
info.name: MazaCoin
info.desc: The underlying software is derived from that of another cryptocurrency, ZetaCoin.

info.creator: Monero Core Team
info.name: Monero
info.desc: Privacy-centric coin based on the CryptoNote protocol with improvements for scalability and decentralization.

info.creator: Edward Mansfield & Richard Allen
info.name: Titcoin
info.desc: The first cryptocurrency to be nominated for a major adult industry award.

info.creator: Sunerok
info.name: Verge
info.desc: Features anonymous transactions using Tor.

info.creator: Jed McCaleb
info.name: Stellar
info.desc: Open-source, decentralized global financial network.

info.creator: David Muller
info.name: Vertcoin
info.desc: Aims to be ASIC resistant.

info.creator: Vitalik Buterin
info.name: Ethereum
info.desc: Supports Turing-complete smart contracts.

info.creator: Œæ
info.name: Ethereum Classic
info.desc: An alternative version of Ethereum Supports Turing-complete smart contracts.

info.creator: Colin LeMahieu
info.name: Nano
info.desc: Decentralized, feeless, open-source, peer-to-peer cryptocurrency. First to use a Block Lattice structure.

info.creator: Jan Ludovicus van der Velde
info.name: Tether
info.desc: Tether claims to be backed by USD at a 1 to 1 ratio. The company has been unable to produce promised audits.

info.creator: Poramin Insom
info.name: Firo
info.desc: The first financial system employing Zero-knowledge proof to protect users' privacy.

info.creator: Zooko Wilcox
info.name: Zcash
info.desc: The first open, permissionless financial system employing zero-knowledge security.

info.name: Bitcoin Cash
info.desc: Hard fork from bitcoin, increased maximum block size from 1MB to 8MB (as of 2018, 32MB)

info.creator: Dan Larimer
info.name: EOS.IO
info.desc: Feeless Smart contract platform for decentralized applications and decentralized autonomous corporations with a block time of 500 ms.

info.creator: Charles Hoskinson
info.name: Cardano
info.desc: A proof-of-stake blockchain platform: developed through evidence-based methods and peer-reviewed research.

info.name: AmbaCoin
info.desc: official cryptocurrency of the Cameroonian separatist entity of Ambazonia

info.creator: Kevin Wang, Daniel Lv, Terry Tai
info.name: Nervos Network
info.desc: Multi-layered blockchain smart contract platform

info.creator: Silvio Micali
info.name: Algorand
info.desc: Uses a verifiable random function to randomly select groups of users to certify blocks.

info.creator: Emin G√ºn Sirer, Kevin Sekniqi, Maofan "Ted" Yin
info.name: Avalanche

info.creator: Nader al-Naji (aka diamondhands)

info.desc: Also a social media platform, resembling Twitter.
